name: Soda Crush Saga
description:
This is a super fun match-3 game with everything you need for delicious cake pie.
Different gameplay, different props, and different elimination experience, let you play as much as you like.

Slide the cake pie to form a row. More than three in a row can be eliminated, the more the better.
The cake pie coated with cream or wrapped in a package can be exchanged to achieve super elimination.

There are more interesting items to choose from, increase the number of steps, increase time, and force exchanges.
There are a lot of tasks. After you finish, you can receive a lot of gold coins to exchange for game props, waiting for you.
